translations:
连续炮轰（cannonade
 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: It was dark when the cannonading stopped all of a sudden.
sentences.translation: 到了天黑之后，炮轰才突然停止。

sentences.sentence: All that day, from morning until past sunset, the cannon never ceased to roar. It was dark when the cannonading stopped all of a sudden.
sentences.translation: 整整那一天，从清晨到太阳下山，大炮没有停止轰轰作响，黑夜中，连续不断的炮声突然停止。
